name: Don Quixote's Quest for World Peace
name_original: Don Quixote's Quest for World Peace
description:
In a world run by mutants where the more limbs you have the higher up the hierarchy you are. A one limbed blob named Don lives happily collecting treasures. One day he finds a time capsule containing a book: Don Quixote. Inspired by the tale of a noble knight, Don took up a sword and set off to fight evil!

Controls (can be configured in game):

ActionMouse & Keyboard (default)Gamepad (XBox)MovementWADL-ThumbstickInteractEXSword SpinMouse MovementR-ThumbstickPunchHold LMBHold RTQuick RestartRYPauseEscStartStop BouncingShiftLT
